summary: An ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 45670, entitled "An ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 44909, entitled: "An ordinance relating to official bonds to be given by certain officers of the City of Seattle, prescribing the amounts thereof, repealing Ordinance No. 42832, and all other Ordinances and parts thereof in conflict with this Ordinance".
